sentences: Tahked osakesed on suuremad kui vedelikud.
Need suuremad osakesed ei lahustu t채ielikult.
context: "Suuremad" is the comparative plural form of "suur" meaning big/large. In this context, it refers to particles that are bigger than those in true solutions but smaller than suspensions or emulsions. The word describes size relationships between different types of colloidal dispersions and their particle sizes.
